meanings.sent1: Adding more fuel potentiates the fire, making it burn brighter.
meanings.sent2: Studying regularly potentiates your ability to learn new things.
meanings.sent3: Eating spinach before a test potentiates your brainpower - Popeye was onto something!
meanings.sent4: Kindness potentiates the strength of relationships, making them more resilient.
meanings.sent5: Exercise potentiates your energy levels, giving you a boost throughout the day.

meanings.definition: Increase the effect of (a drug or other action).
meanings.sent1: Drinking water potentiates the effects of some medications, helping them work better.
meanings.sent2: Taking vitamin C potentiates the absorption of iron in your body.
meanings.sent3: Wearing lucky socks potentiates your chances of winning a game - it's all about the socks!
meanings.sent4: Positive thinking potentiates the impact of affirmations, making them more powerful.
meanings.sent5: Music potentiates emotions, intensifying the feelings evoked by a song.
